title: The Most Unexpected Tech Finds!
description: Thank you to Best Buy for sponsoring this video. Go to bestbuy.com to find all of your holiday shopping tech needs. All products from the video are linked below:   Hover-1 - Jive Electric Folding Scooter with 16 mi Max Operating Range and 14 mph Max Speed - White:    Therabody TheraFace PRO 6-in-1 facial hair device:    Kryptonite evolution 1090 integrated chain 35.5:    TRX Elite System Suspension Trainer Black/ Yellow:    TRX Xmount Plate Gray:    TRX Invizi-Mount Plate Gray:    Bosu Sports Balance Trainer:    Nest Learning Smart Wifi Thermostat  White:    Mophie Powerstation XXL PD, 20,000 MaH Portable charger:    Quip plastic smart electric toothbrush starter kit white:    Insignia all in one travel converter:     PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:      BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Hey everyone, it's Justine, and today I partner with Best Buy to show you some unexpected tech finds. (upbeat music) Even though I'm one of the biggest Best Buy fan, it is always so surprising to find things on their website that I never thought Best Buy would carry. All of the things that I'm showing you today were things that I've had on my purchase list so I was so surprised and excited to find them at Best Buy. (upbeat music) First up, let's talk about health and wellness. Now, I was so excited to find this TRX trainer at Best Buy because this is something that I've always loved at gyms. So I was beyond hype to see they carry not only the TRX Elite System suspension, but all of the accessories like this TRX XMount Plate and this Invizi Mount Plate. The install is super simple. You just have to install these plates either on the wall or the ceiling, and you're good to go. And now I'm here about to install it in my own garage at home. Can't wait to try this out. Oh, a little bracelet. Here's our suspension anchor, and we have some resistance bands. I love resistance workouts and I'm a huge fan of resistance bands. Even if you can't take the TRX system with you, these things are incredible. We've got a little workout exercise poster. Oh, we're definitely hanging this up. I've watched a bunch of review videos and I've seen a lot of people make this mistake. Never clip these anchors onto each other. You never want the metal to be touching the metal. This is the moment that I've been waiting for. I've been preparing for this honestly for days. I've watched so many YouTube videos. Our TRX is hung, and now it's time to test it out. (upbeat music) Nothing yet, stay tuned. Another product that I love, is the Bosu Sports Balance Trainer. This is also a very simple gym accessory that I've never owned, but always loved using at the gym. Much like the TRX, this is another great tool for doing body weight exercises, advanced ab training and mostly used for improving your balance. I clearly have not been working on my balance recently, so I am so glad that I now have this added to my gym. It's all set up. This is so exciting. Oh yeah, I mean, I feel so fit already. There's also a bunch of workouts that you can do. So I've got this little QR code that I can scan and this will give you some manuals, workouts and wall charts. And I can add those to my TRX wall charts over there. (upbeat music) Now that we have our fitness out of the way, let's talk about travel. So recently I went to Europe and as a tech reviewer, I forgot one of the most important things that anybody really traveling outta the country would need and that is a travel converter or an adapter. This is the Insignia converter and adapter. So it'll convert from 240 to 120. So you'll be able to use this in different countries. It's super easy to use too. You just go like that for wherever it is that you're traveling to. So over here on the side, you have the adapter and converter so you can switch to whichever mode you'd like. And there's also two lights on the front that'll let you know which mode you're in. There is even two USB-A pots on the bottom. I also was traveling with an electric toothbrush that was really large. So when I saw this Quip plastic smart electric toothbrush, I couldn't wait to try it out. It's small compact and will actually earn you awards like free brush heads, products and gift cards as you track your brushing habits with their free app. There is nothing that I love more than earning awards for doing everyday tasks. So I also like that this has a little toothbrush cover so I can put my toothbrush in there and it has this adhesive on the back. So I can just basically stick that to wherever I want and my toothbrush is ready to go for my next brush. No travel is complete without a Mophie Powerstation. This is the XXL 20,000 milliamp hour portable charger. I really like this one because it has two USB-A and one USB-C, giving you the flexibility to charge multiple things with various outputs. It's also a pretty small size considering how much power it will be able to deliver. (upbeat music) This summer, I've been riding my bike a lot more and I haven't had a good bike lot. So I picked up this Kryptonite Evolution 1090 Integrated Chain. It has three stainless steel keys and one actually has an LED light with replaceable batteries. Time to go for a bike ride. Got some brake lights back there. So this is our throttle. So basically to get started, you get going, hit the throttle and also has this nice speed lock function too. So if you are going on longer rides, you don't have to continually hold the throttle. This is your breaks. Also has a really nice folding mechanism. So we just pull up right here, pull out, fold and you're ready to take this wherever you need to go. I never thought that I was a scooter person but here we are. Apparently I am one.
